clip.quote: Find out something which you've got in common. Establish some sort of rapport, get some kind of relationship going and then work on solving the problem.
clip.why_clipworthy: It provides a clear, actionable strategy for starting negotiations on the right foot.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to win more negotiations? Start by finding common ground.

clip.quote: AI will give you some feedback in terms of should you do this or should you not do this.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the role of AI as a decision-making aid in negotiations.
clip.suggested_hook: How AI can guide your negotiation decisions in real-time.
